dialogue.introduction: Good morning!　I'm Hayasui, an oiler equipped with seaplanes!　I'll do my best to support everyone!
dialogue.library_intro: Fleet escort oiler, Hayasui. Best regards! I'm a multi-purpose refuel vessel that can supply a variety of different materials and am also designed to carry carrier-based aircraft. With a change of plans after the Battle of Midway, I also became able to launch Ryuusei.
dialogue.secretary2: A supply mission, admiral? I'll do my best!
dialogue.secretary3: Admiral, my turntable is... um... well... it's nothing. I'm fine!
dialogue.secretaryidle: Excuse me, aren't we suppose to go for our next mission? Oh, not yet? I'm sorry. Is there anything i can help... Yes. I'll be on standby.
dialogue.secretarymarried: Admiral, Ryuusei is fine, but seaplane is good too. Zuiun is also... Ah...No! Not about me...I was talking about... Mogami-san or Hyuuga-san...
dialogue.wedding: Admiral, did you call for me? Hm? This box is for me? Can I open it? Whoa... so beautiful! Ah! Does this mean... Does this mean...!!!
dialogue.show_players_score: The recent report right, admiral? Yes, right away!
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: Yes sir. Combined Fleet commanded oil tanker Hayasui, Setting sail!
dialogue.equipment1: This equipment is... Ah, yes! It is compatible with me!
dialogue.equipment2: With this... Perhaps with this i can fight alongside the others in the fleet.
dialogue.supply: That's right. Even i needed to resupply too. Thank you as always, admiral!
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: I'm sorry, My armaments and my supply equipment is... Yes, I'll get it fix.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Oh no! There's a hole in my petroleum tank? Eh!? The Powder magazine and the provisions too? I'm sorry. I'll fix it up.
dialogue.ship_construction: A new ship is ready for commission. I'm looking forward to it.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: The fleet has returned! Ahh... thank goodness everyone's fine.
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Supply corps 1 flagship, Hayasui, Set sail! The fleet is mobile!
dialogue.battle_start: Enemy fleet spotted!? Umm... Attacking! Hayasui air squadron, prepare for take off!
dialogue.air_battle: Hayasui air squadron, I'm counting on you!
dialogue.attack: Is the flight deck OK? Air squadron, launch!
dialogue.night_battle: Night battle? Hmm... We have to do this! Cannons, ready for barrage. Charging in!
dialogue.night_attack: Hayasui air squadron, I'm counting on you!
dialogue.artillery_spotting: Hayasui air squadron, I'm counting on you!
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: Hayasui air squadron, I'm counting on you!
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: Hayasui air squadron, I'm counting on you!
dialogue.mvp: Ehh!? My air team performs very well? I'm sincerely happy about it. I really am!
dialogue.minor_damaged1: Hyaaah! Oh no... Is the crude oil tank OK?
dialogue.minor_damaged2: I-It hurts! Ahh... Not my precious supply goods...!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: I'm hit. I don't have much protection, so I'm having a bit of trouble right now.
dialogue.sunk: Ah...? My body is tilting forward...? Eh? Hayasui is... sinking...? No...
dialogue.fall_2015: Admiral, it's autumn, autumn. Hayasui really likes autumn for some reason. Shall I bake us some potatoes?
dialogue.christmas_2015: Admiral, Merry Christmas! Hayasui made a cake as well, you know? Here, open your mouth. Aaanh~
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: It's already the end of the year, Admiral. Cleaning.. We have to do Spring Cleaning or else! Irako-chan and the others look busy too! Okay, Hayasui will do her best too, yes!
dialogue.new_year_2016: Admiral, Happy New Year! Please treat me well this year as well!
dialogue.setsubun_2016: It's Setsubun. Yes, Hayasui brought lots of beans too. Let's throw them together! Ei!
dialogue.valentines_day_2016: Admiral, p-please accept this chocolate! It-it's handmade.

hourly.0000: Admiral, the date has changed. Hayasui will be alerting you on the time. Yes! Leave it to me.
hourly.0100: Admiral, it is 0100. Yes. Hayasui is still fine. Look!
hourly.0200: Admiral, it is 0200. No, I'm not feeling sleepy! Yes!
hourly.0300: 03...0...0... H-huh? I'm awake! I'm totally fine!
hourly.0400: 0...4... Mmph... I can't load any more...
hourly.0500: Mmph... mmph... Wah! Come on, Admiral! Why didn't you wake me up! No!
hourly.0600: It is 0600. Admiral... Yes, I'm sorry. I will start preparing breakfast.
hourly.0700: 0700, and the breakfast is ready. Please, help yourself. Today's menu is mugimeshi with potato miso soup, dried fish and...
hourly.0800: Admiral, it is 0800. Yes! It might not be as good as Mamiya-san's, but I have a storage so I am quite good at cooking.
hourly.0900: Admiral, it is 0900. Well, let's work hard today as well!
hourly.1000: Admiral, it is 1000. We will start with status check on the expedition fleet. Hmmm...
hourly.1100: Admiral, it is 1100. Expedition should be good with this! Would next be exercise? Okay!
hourly.1200: Admiral, it is 1200 and noon! I will bring the lunch! Please wait.
hourly.1300: It is 1300. Admiral, how was Hayasui's Omurice? Hehehe, I might have gone a little over the line.
hourly.1400: Admiral, it is 1400. Let's do our best for the afternoon as well.
hourly.1500: It is 1500. Admiral, how about having some tea and sweets? Hayasui, will prepare them. Please wait.
hourly.1600: Admiral, it is 1600. Eh? Kazahaya? No, I haven't meant her in a while. I'm pretty it's been since Truk or something. I wonder if she's doing well...
hourly.1700: Admiral, it is 1700. Isn't the sunset beautiful. I want to watch it forever.
hourly.1800: Admiral, it is 1800. What should we do about dinner. What will be good? Hayasui, will prepare it.
hourly.1900: 1900! Yes! I did my best to prepare a Western style dinner. The main dish is beef steak! Yes, beef steak! It's special!
hourly.2000: Admiral, it is 2000. Here is your after dinner coffee. Did the dinner suit your taste? Really!? I'm glad.
hourly.2100: Admiral, it is 2100. The third torpedo squadron seems to be lively. I wonder what's going on? Eh, don't worry about it? Ah, okay.
hourly.2200: Admiral, it is 2200. Eh? Taiyou-san? Yes, I believe we'll meet here someday. For sure.
hourly.2300: 2300. Admiral, good work today as well. Let's do our best tomorrow too! Yes!
